content.html: Want to know the secret to blogging more often? Lower your standards! A post which you don't think is ready yet is a LOT better than a giant folder full of drafts that no-one ever gets to see (Your readers won't ever know how good the thing you wanted to write would have been)
content.value:
Want to know the secret to blogging more often?

Lower your standards!

A post which you don't think is ready yet is a LOT better than a giant folder full of drafts that no-one ever gets to see

(Your readers won't ever know how good the thing you wanted to write would have been)
